SUSHANTHPEDAMALLU

SUMMARY
Motivated and detail-oriented recent graduate with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and a solid
foundation in Java development. Proficient in Java programming, object-oriented design, and key
frameworks such as Spring and Hibernate. Hands-on experience gained through academic projects,
internships, and self-driven learning initiatives. Eager to leverage strong analytical skills and
programming knowledge to contribute to innovative software solutions. Adept at problem-solving, quick
to learn new technologies, and excited to work in collaborative, fast-paced environments. Committed to
continuous learning and passionate about starting a career as a Java Developer.
